li.label: absent-minded
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} tends to let {PAWN_possessive} mind drift, even in the middle of work. {PAWN_pronoun} may sometimes stop tasks at random.

li.label: eccentric
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a screw loose, but it comes with a sharper scientific mind.

li.label: perfectionist
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} strives for perfection in {PAWN_possessive} work. {PAWN_pronoun} produces higher-quality products, but works more slowly. Failing to meet {PAWN_possessive} standards causes unhappiness, and on rare occasions {PAWN_pronoun} may abandon a project mid-way.

li.label: coward
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef}'s instincts lean heavily toward cowardice. In danger, {PAWN_pronoun} will often hide or run before standing to fight.

li.label: brave
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has stronger mental and physical fortitude than most. {PAWN_pronoun} can endure pain more readily, and is slower to break under harsh conditions.

li.label: clumsy
li.description: Minor bruises and scrapes plague {PAWN_nameDef}, usually from tripping or falling due to poor coordination.

li.label: heat inclined
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} enjoys the heat of a dry summer day. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't mind working up a sweat or sleeping in warmth.

li.label: cold inclined
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} enjoys the chill of a brisk winter night. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't mind shivering or sleeping in the cold.

li.label: heavy sleeper
li.description: A bomb could go off beside {PAWN_nameDef} while {PAWN_pronoun} sleeps, and {PAWN_pronoun} would keep right on sleeping. {PAWN_pronoun} can't be bothered to work or defend the colony mid-nap.

li.label: neat
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is naturally hygienic and organized. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't track dirt or scatter trash, and enjoys cleaning.

li.label: slob
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is naturally sloppy, leaving trash and dirt scattered around. At least {PAWN_pronoun} isn't much bothered by messy surroundings.

li.label: workaholic
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} struggles to take breaks or rest mid-job. {PAWN_pronoun} will keep working, even at the expense of {PAWN_possessive} health or sleep.

li.label: iron stomach
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has never known nausea. Food poisoning and vomiting are foreign to {PAWN_objective}.

li.label: animal lover
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} can't stand cruelty toward animals. {PAWN_pronoun} feels happier when nuzzled or acting as master to a tamed animal, but is more deeply upset when losing one. {PAWN_pronoun} also refuses to butcher animals.

li.label: animal hater
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} believes in human superiority over animals. {PAWN_pronoun} dislikes bonding or being nuzzled, but feels satisfaction when animals die or are sold.

li.label: big-boned
li.description: Whether from bulk or awkward posture, {PAWN_nameDef} has broken a few chairs in {PAWN_possessive} time, and is likely to break more.

li.label: rebel
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} only plays by {PAWN_possessive} own rules. When forced, {PAWN_pronoun} will drag {PAWN_possessive} feet and work more slowly.

li.label: submissive
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} needs clear direction on when and how to act. {PAWN_pronoun} works at normal speed only when ordered, and otherwise slows down.

li.label: vengeful
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is fueled by spite. {PAWN_pronoun} can’t stand sharing the colony with rivals, and feels happier when one of them dies.

li.label: technophobe
li.description: Whether from trauma or fear of change, {PAWN_nameDef} rejects modernity. {PAWN_pronoun} may lash out at machines, refuses to research, and feels satisfaction from destroying mechanoids.

li.label: fun-loving
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} lives for a good time. {PAWN_pronoun} remembers parties fondly, and the joy lasts far longer than it does for most.

li.label: dunce
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has limited mental capacity. {PAWN_pronoun} learns slowly and struggles with conversation, but tends to be naturally happy.

li.label: martial artist
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has trained in melee combat and learned a special move to disarm opponents.

li.label: snob
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} believes they belong in high society, and loves nothing more than critiquing art and brushing elbows with royalty.

li.label: squeamish
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} gets a sour stomach around blood or corpses. Vomiting is just part of life for {PAWN_objective}.

li.label: anxious
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is naturally anxious, especially in social situations. {PAWN_pronoun} avoids gatherings and sometimes retreats to {PAWN_possessive} room to cope.

li.label: insatiable
li.description: No amount of lovin’ is ever enough for {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_pronoun} tends to move between partners and seeks intimacy often.

li.label: prude
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} gives {PAWN_possessive} body only to a spouse and would never initiate divorce. {PAWN_pronoun} also dislikes nudity more than most.

li.label: couch potato
li.description: An armchair and a screen are all {PAWN_nameDef} needs to be happy. {PAWN_pronoun} never tires of watching television, and always feels good after.

li.label: cat person
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} enjoys the company of cats and gravitates toward bonding with them, but dislikes dogs.

li.label: dog person
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} enjoys the company of dogs and gravitates toward bonding with them, but dislikes cats.

li.label: prodigy
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a sharp, logical mind. {PAWN_pronoun} researches faster than most, and {PAWN_possessive} rational outlook makes {PAWN_objective} less prone to mental breaks.

li.label: menagerist
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} believes animals are essential to life and society. {PAWN_pronoun} feels happier with more of them around, and is especially skilled at taming and training.

li.label: Ocean lover
li.description: The sea calls to {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_pronoun} feels happier when near the ocean or a deep river.

li.label: Mountain lover
li.description: The mountains call to {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_pronoun} feels happier when near a large mountain.

li.label: mad surgeon
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} hides a twisted obsession. {PAWN_pronoun} treats organ harvesting as a dark experiment and takes pleasure in it. Harvesting makes {PAWN_objective} happy, but going too long without fuels growing unrest.

li.label: drunken master
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} fights best when drunk. {PAWN_pronoun} grows more dangerous in melee the more intoxicated {PAWN_pronoun} becomes.

li.label: kleptomaniac
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is compelled to steal, even from guests and allies, risking angering others.

li.label: stoner
li.description: Smokeleaf is a way of life for {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_pronoun} adores it and would rather die than give it up.

li.label: lush
li.description: Alcohol is a way of life for {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_pronoun} adores drinking and would rather die than give it up.

li.label: wanderlust
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} loves to travel and feels happiest on the move. {PAWN_pronoun} grows restless when staying too long in one place, but moves quickly and forages well while caravanning.

li.label: insomniac
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is never fully asleep or awake. {PAWN_pronoun} lurches along in a slow, shambler-like state, and only sleeps once every few days.

li.label: world weary
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has grown tired of the world. {PAWN_pronoun} struggles with bleak thoughts, making {PAWN_possessive} personality difficult to befriend.

li.label: desensitized
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is hardened by old emotional trauma. {PAWN_pronoun} feels nothing from death or loss, whether animal, colonist, family, or prisoner.

li.label: refined palate
li.description: Only the finest meals satisfy {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_pronoun} feels indifferent toward ordinary food, but savors lavish meals and gains greater joy from them.

li.label: academian
li.description: Through scholastic pursuit, {PAWN_nameDef} has become well-read. {PAWN_pronoun} excels in science and medicine, and tends patients with greater skill.

li.label: groundbreaker
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} believes infrastructure is everything. {PAWN_pronoun} is a natural builder and stoneworker, constructing and mining with greater speed and efficiency.

li.label: gastronomist
li.description: To {PAWN_nameDef}, food is art. {PAWN_pronoun} creates beautiful, delicious meals that are almost always safe to eat.

li.label: ecologist
li.description: Flora and fauna are vital to {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_pronoun} uses every part of plants and animals, and appreciates nature’s gifts.

li.label: tycoon
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has an eye for silver and a silver tongue to match. {PAWN_pronoun} values {PAWN_possessive} own goods highly, and convinces others to do the same.

li.label: thick skinned
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is strangely hypercoagulating and will bleed much more slowly than most.

li.label: thin skinned
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is strangely hemophilic and tends to bleed much more profusely than others.

li.label: schizoid
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} bottles up {PAWN_possessive} feelings for long stretches of time. When the pressure grows too great, {PAWN_pronoun} may suddenly break down.
